title: Methodology for Evaluating Educational Technology Usability: A Literature Review-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic concepts of educational technology and usability evaluation
context.additional_context: Focus on acquiring methods to evaluate the usability of educational technology in smartphone-based constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can classify major types of educational technology usability evaluation methodologies (surveys, observations, etc.) and explain their application contexts
An analysis of trends in usability evaluation research on e-learning technologies in higher education environments can be reported in a written study.
A project proposal can be developed by comparatively analyzing usability evaluation indicators across technological, pedagogical, and sociocultural dimensions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
